title: Old but greate game
content:
Hello,

Bud Redhead ( [url=http://www.fungamesplaza.com/pd-bud_redhead.html]www.fungamesplaza.com/pd-...dhead.html[/url] ) is a great game; anyone knows other games in the same style? I am specially interested in high quality remakes after old hits in jump and run style, etc.... These games are great, and I would like to have as many of them as possible.

title: Re: Old but greate game
content:
Sorry, I don't know.. I've played Bud Redhead demo version though, gotta agree it's pretty good. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Old but greate game
content:
I've never heard of it... it looks quite interesting though.------------------
www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk My website is going to go back online
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: Old but greate game
content:
That's a pretty good game, very polished. It actually reminds me of a mix between a few other games, namely Claw, Superfrog and Jazz Jackrabbit. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

This has something Amiga-like to it. Must be the combination of module music with a colourful game or something.____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
